text: Consider the following method p is called by 4 concurrent processes with following shared variables. Assume that initial value of semaphore q = 2; void p () { for(int k = 1; k > = 0; k-—-) { wait(q) ; printf (“+ 7); printf ("~ ) ; signal(q) ; } } Which of the following substrings is/are possible substrings of the output strings?
